details.title: Machine Learning
details.description: Predictive Analytics: Developing machine learning models to analyze historical data, identify patterns, and make accurate predictions about future outcomes.

details.title: Deep Learning
details.description: Image Recognition: Training deep neural networks to recognize objects, faces, and patterns in images and videos for applications such as security, healthcare, and retail.

details.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
details.description: Developing NLP models to understand and generate human-like text, enabling applications such as chatbots, sentiment analysis, and language translation.

details.title: Computer Vision
details.description: Object Detection and Tracking: Building computer vision systems to detect, classify, and track objects in real-time video streams for applications such as surveillance and autonomous vehicles.

details.title: Chatbot Development
details.description: Conversational AI: Designing and implementing chatbots that simulate natural conversations and assist users with tasks such as customer support, information retrieval, and transaction processing.

details.title: Data Science
details.description: Data Analysis: Applying statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms to analyze large datasets, extract insights, and drive data-driven decision-making.
